title: A merie newe ballad intituled the pinnyng of the basket and is to bee songe to the tune of the doune right squire.
author: Rider, T.
publisher: By Henrie Kirkham, and are to be sold at his shop, at the little north doore of Paules, at the signe of the blacke Boye,
notes: Verse - "It was my hap of late to heare,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
